title: PLS FIX YOUR GAME!
text:
Among us overall, is a very fun game, but it is hard to do the free chat and it’s annoying to not have your own account. Please fix this if you cannot fix both, I understand but at least fix one. let us be able to make our own account. Please let us be able to do free chat.

Your game was once very popular until you got rid of free chat, and you got rid of creating your own account

I believe you can become popular again if you fix these problems

So please let us create an account and let free chat be a thing again!

title: Problems that need looked at!!!
text:
First of I would like to say I encounter hackers very often and they ruin my experience. Second maybe make there be a no cuss in policy, and sensor cusses when said in the chat. Third, the chat can be hard to use without an account and some people like to talk without quick chat, also you should add a voice chat to this game to make maximum efficiency. Last but not least, there should be more roles and more maps and I know the devs can do it and they are amazing people. 
Keep up the good work guys!!

title: Meh🤷‍♂️
text: I mean its a good game and all but having to make an account killed it. I really hate to see this game fall as hard as it did, because I ended up making a character within it that blew up. Yes, this is the original Mr Cheese. I overall like this game, its simple and quick as well as being a fun little game to play with friends. But now it really feels like it’s a massive cash grab, as there are battle passes and cosmetics to buy. As someone who has played it for years and made a huge impact on the community, I really did like the game. The other roles just make it too stressful and the cosmetics seem locked behind a pay wall.
